lead_paragraph: The armies of Reichsfuehrer Hitler are again on the march. German troops were in Sofia, capital of Bulgaria, and at Varna, Black Sea naval base and most important Bulgarian port, last night, and they had made at least their preliminary moves without Bulgarian or British opposition.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
